bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Edward Johnston was a resident of Brooklyn at least in the 1950s and 1990s. He was a member of the 77th Reconnaissance Company of the 77th Infantry Division, and served during World War II. He later became involved in the St. Stanislaus Memorial Post 1771 of the American Legion in Greenpoint. He served as the Post's Commanding Officer from 1991-1993 and again from 1994-1995. Johnston worked for 36 years at the Man-Dell supermarket chain.
